select ci.ci_id "ciId", ci.c_id "commodities.cId", ci.number "commodities.number", ci.ct_id "commodityType.ct_id", ci.cc_id "commodityCombo.cc_id", ct.type_name "commodityType.typeName", ct.price "commodityType.price", cc.cc_name "commodityCombo.ccname", cc.price "commodityCombo.price" from Commodity_items ci,commodity_Type ct,commodity_Combo cc where cc.cc_id=ci.cc_id and ct.ct_id=ci.ct_id and ci_id= #{ciId}
